Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a Node instance that can be further used to create a graph. Uses Ball class for visualization. Combined with Graph classes.
    See Also:
    Graph, Graph1, Graph2, Graph3, Graph4, Graph5, Ball

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node(java.lang.String label,
            double x,
            double y,
            java.lang.String colour)
        Constructor. Creates a Node and when combined with the Graph class which in turn uses GameArena class, can add that Node to the location specified by x and y.
        Parameters:
        label - Data that the Node will store
        x - XPosition of this Node
        y - YPosition of this Node
        colour - Colour of the visual representation of this Node
